title: Raw session data
description: Information about user interactions captured during a single session

page.description: A page where the data was captured

area.description: The visual region identifier provided to the Detector

span.description: Time period in which this session was recorded

start.description: Timestamp of the first event included in the heat map (in ms)

end.description: Timestamp of the last event included in the heat map (in ms)

events.description: List of events captured during this session

items.description: Information about a single user interaction

time.description: Timestamp of when this event was recorded (in ms)
